item.description:
Please RSVP!

TITLE: Trading Options Butterflies for Income by John Locke, Locke in Your Success 

 

 

John Locke will present some of the options butterfly positions on the Russell 2000 index that he has traded profitably over the last five years.  He will introduce his hedged butterfly trade system and then show the bearish butterfly trade system.  To manage risk, John scales into his trades and makes adjustments when the market dictates.  If time allows, he will discuss how to plan your options trades by reading the market and how to modify your approach and increase your probability of winning and increase your profits!  

John is an internationally known success and trading performance coach. He is the managing partner of Locke in Your Success, LLC, a company that provides professional coaching and mentoring services designed to help traders reach their full potential.

Note that this talk is an intermediate options talk that assumes some knowledge of options.  BIG member David Lothrop will present an introduction to options butterflies at 6:00 Wednesday, January 25, before the regular BIG meeting at 7:00.

 

To join our online discussion go to http://groups.google.com/bostonibd .  If you have a friend you talk stocks with, bring them with you! Food or drinks are not allowed in any MIT meeting room. We strongly urge each person to make his or her own decisions about investing their money. Investment ideas and recommendations made during our meetings and in our online dialogs bear no liability by anyone. This is a free and open meeting. No membership is required, but please RSVP.
item.name: Special Speakers Meeting - John Locke - Trading Options Butterflies - 9am-12pm
